mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.query

Class SpatialQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.query.BasicQuery
      • mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.query.SpatialQuery
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Persistable, DistributableQuery, Query
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IndexOnlySpatialQuery, SpatialTemporalQuery

    public class SpatialQuery
extends BasicQuery
    The Spatial Query class represents a query in two dimensions. The constraint that is applied represents an intersection operation on the query geometry.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class mil.nga.giat.geowave.store.query.BasicQuery
